title: Racing Pigs And Giant Marrows Travels around the North Country Fairs
description: An alternate cover edition of this ISBN can be found here.Harry Pearson vowed that his next project would be about the summerâ€”specifically, about a summer of shows and fairs in the north of England. Encompassing such diverse talents as fell-running, tupperware-boxing, and rabbit fancying (literally), and containing many more jokes about goats than is legal in the Isle of Man, Racing Pigs and Giant Marrows must be the only book in existence to explain the design faults of earwigs.
author: Harry Pearson
